import React from 'react' import './Sidebar.css' import { Icon } from 'web3uikit' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useMoralis } from 'react-moralis' const Sidebar = () => { const { Moralis } = useMoralis() const user = Moralis.User.current() return ( <>
Home
Profile
Setting
{user.attributes.username.slice(0, 6)}
) } export default Sidebar
